body.name: LENRUE USB Computer Speakers for Desktop Monitor, Small PC Speakers with Crisp Sound, Knob Control, Touch Colored Lights, Bluetooth/USB C for PC Laptop Tablet Phone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: Basic Sound & Simple Knob: Computer speakers are small but loud. Able to meet basic needs. The upgraded knob can adjust the volume and turn on/off the speaker to replace complex buttons.
Single USB Cable & Plug and Play: Desktop speakers without battery and AUX cable. Only one USB cable for power and audio, plug and play. Avoid more cables that cause clutter on the table.

Bluetooth & USB C Adapter Included: Bluetooth can be automatically connected without manual switching! 3 play ways are more suitable for all kinds of computers, PCs, desktops, Laptops, tablets, phones, and most systems.
Cable Ties & Compact Portable: PC speakers increase cable ties to organize cables and take up less space. Small and compact size perfectly sits unobtrusively below the monitor.
Touch Lights: Touch the computer speaker screen anywhere can switch 5 light modes. Increase the game or music atmosphere. Long touch the screen to turn on/off lights.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Switch between Bluetooth and Wired Mode Switch Bluetooth Mode Turn on the computer speaker (default wired mode), turn on Bluetooth in the phone to pair with "X11". Switch Wire Mode Turn off Bluetooth in the phone and will switch to wired mode automatically.
Connect Back to iPhone via Bluetooth Unable to pair bluetooth successfully 1. Delete the "X11" pairing name. 2. Search for "X11" to pair again.
Q: What if the sound is very quiet? A: If the sound is not loud enough, adjust of 3 positions: (1) Web pages or Apps volume (2) X11 Computer speakers volume (3) Computers or laptops system volume

USB Computer Speakers Specification Power USB/USB C (Included) Audio USB/USB C/Bluetooth Adjusting Volume Knob to adjust the volume Cable Length 54 inches ultra-long with cable ties Dimension 2.37 × 9.84 × 2.56 ins(L × W × H) Adjusting Light Touch the screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely impressive for the price
reviews.reviewText: I tested these plugged into an iPhone 13. For how cheap these are, I can't believe how good they sound, with a surprisingly full sound that has more of a low end than I anticipated (I anticipated none), and they even look pretty cool. Build quality is better than you might expect too. Nobody would confuse these for expensive top-tier speakers up close, but they don't look like cheap trash either. Don't get me wrong - these are still sub-$10 speakers, and if they were pricier it would be easy to critique the slightly muffled low end and somewhat hollow midrange, but for casual listening at that price I have nothing to complain about.Frankly I got these expecting to get tinny, garbage speakers and for my use case, I would've been happy with that (I got these for a Zaireeka listening party, a quirky experimental album that uses four separate CDs on separate systems that play simultaneously across eight speakers, and variances in sound quality across the different systems are part of the experimental fun of the thing). But these sound good enough that I'm going to find another use for them. For serious music listening, you obviously shouldn't be considering speakers in the $10 range. But if your priority is price, then you get a ridiculous bang for your buck with these guys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars decent for an inexpensive speaker
reviews.reviewText: I needed a speaker for my backup desktop computer. This works well for what I need. I am not really excited about the light show, but that is personal opinion. The light show is probably good for someone interested in such. I can shut off the lights and do so. The sound quality and volume are better than expected for an inexpensive speaker. I am overall happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value but...
reviews.reviewText: These speakers are easy to install, sleek, and compact. They have a volume knob and a noise reduction function. The sound quality is excellent, loud, clear, and bassy.Only one thing I don't like was the Volume control. They getting too high or too low, but hard to adjust in between, but not a big deal. that's the reason I gave a 4 starsThey are perfect for various audio activities. They are affordable, durable, and reliable. TI highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the classroom
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to use with my Chromebook at school. I am a teacher and need the ability to easily add volume and portability to small group presentations. This USB device works seamlessly and doesn’t require me to remember to “charge” the device.

reviews.reviewText: There’s 1 thing. I find quite annoying it makes a buzzing sound every time. I turn it off Good for 10 dollars. But I’m leaving a 4 star. Because of the buzzing sound. I really do like the speaker though do, I recommend yes.
Simple to set up and sounds great!
